name: Legend Of Mercy 神医魔导
description: Experience the story of a doctor who performs miracles, and beautiful girls from another world; this is their adventure. With an epic view of the world, compelling stories, high-quality images, and over thirteen chapters telling a long, but thought out, story.
minimum_requirements: OS: WinXP/2003/Vista/7 Processor: Intel Core2DUO 3GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Memory 256Mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: WinXP/2003/Vista/7 Processor: Intel Core2DUO 3GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Memory 256Mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space
